position.marginalia_text:
What manner of evell yt euer thow be / on goddys behalfe I co[n]iure the / I coniure the with the blessyd crosse that Jhc was done one with fforse / I coniure the with the nayls thre yt Jhc was done apon the tre / I coniure the with the crowne of thorne yt on Jhc heyd was done ffor skorne / I coniure the with the blessyd bloode that Jhc bleyd on the Rode / I coniure the with the wounds ffyve yt Jhc suffurt in his lyve / I coniure the with the wholye spere yt longins tyll his hart can bere / yet I coniure the neuer the lasse with all the vertues of the masse / in honore bte marie et bti batolphi et scte apolonie et sancto petro ville et... pr nr et... ane... et unu[m] credo / wel.hathabene hicsana... hicsa... ... hicfathe hicsana..e Wedn helfe cryste helpe
Euforbiu[m] / pelitorie of speane flavyeatur Manuscript note pinned in book containing an exorcism and some notes in the hand of John Dee.
